sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with tian diao jing feng 天吊驚風 , hauled-by-heaven fright wind. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 85, Recipe Entry tian ma wan 天麻丸 , pills with tian ma : 治小兒天吊，眼 目翻上，手足抽掣，發歇不定, “They cure children hauled-by-heaven , with their eyes turned upward; experiencing hand and foot spasms. The periods when this condition is active and when it is dormant are not fixed”. Xiao er tian diao 小兒天釣 , children hooked-up by heaven [1]

Pathological Condition identical with tian diao jing feng 天吊驚風 , hauled-by-heaven fright wind. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry yun tai 芸薹 quoting Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 172: 小兒天瘹 , “Children with the hooked-up-by-heaven illness”, writes: 小兒天釣 , “ Children hooked-up by heaven ”.
